helpText.timeConstraint: Assign role only during a selected time period.

placeholders.typeXCharactersToSearchFor: Type at least {numChars} characters to search for {item}

policyValidationMessages.VALID_PHONE_FORMAT: Must be a valid phone number
policyValidationMessages.MUST_CONTAIN_LOWERCASE_CHARACTERS: Must have at least {minItems} lowercase letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS: Must have at least {minItems} of these characters: {requiredChars}
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER: Must be a number greater than or equal to zero.
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER_GREATER_ZERO: Must be a number greater than or equal to 1.
policyValidationMessages.VALID_TYPE: Must be one of the following types: {validTypes}. Cannot be {invalidType}
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MISSING_REQUIRED_CREATE_ATTRIB: Required attributes must be Read/Write when privilege has Create permission. Missing required attributes: {missingRequiredAttributeLabels}
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_AT_LEAST_ONE_ATTRIBUTE_READONL: Must set at least one attribute permission to Read/Write
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MUST_CONTAIN_CREATE_OR_UPDATE_: Must have at least Create or Update permission
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MUST_CONTAIN_VIEW_PERMISSION: Must have at least View permission when granting access to all attributes
policyValidationMessages.MIN_LENGTH: Must be at least {minLength} characters long
policyValidationMessages.MAX_LENGTH: Must be less than {maxLength} characters long
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_X_CAPITAL_LETTERS: Must have at least {numCaps} capital letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_X_LOWER_LETTERS: Must have at least {numLower} lowercase letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.VALID_BOOLEAN: Value must be of type boolean.
policyValidationMessages.IS_NEW: Must not be the same as the previous {historyLength} password(s)
policyValidationMessages.ALPHA_DASH: Must only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and underscores
policyValidationMessages.PERIOD_REQUIRED: Must contain at least one period character
policyValidationMessages.NO_REPEAT: Cannot contain more than {numRepeat} repeated characters
policyValidationMessages.LENGTH_BASED: Must be at least {min-password-length} characters and no longer than {max-password-length} characters
policyValidationMessages.REPEATED_CHARACTERS: Cannot contain more than {max-consecutive-length} repeated consecutive characters
policyValidationMessages.HISTORY: Cannot match a recently used password
policyValidationMessages.UNKNOWN: Unable to create or modify {property-name} due to an unknown configuration issue
policyValidationMessages.VALID_INT: Value must be of type integer.

policyServiceError.policyApi: Unable to retrieve {policyApi}, Please try again later.
policyServiceError.registration: Unable to register. Please try again later.
policyServiceError.reset: Unable to reset your password. Please try again later.

policyValidationMessages.alphaNumericLowerCaseOnly: Can only contain lower case alphanumeric characters
policyValidationMessages.alphaNumericDashOnly: Can only contain alphanumeric characters, numbers, dashes or underscores
policyValidationMessages.noSpace: Cannot start or end with the space character
policyValidationMessages.urlWithoutPath: URL must not have a path

managedAccess.title: Manage Access
managedAccess.description: Manage how your users can authenticate and gain access to your systems.

managedIdentity.title: Manage Identities
managedIdentity.description: Manage where, when and how your users can change their information.

welcome.title: Welcome to ForgeRock!
welcome.description: With the ForgeRock platform you can control access, identity management and much more.

errors.couldNotRetrieveConfigurationInfo: There was an error retrieving configuration information.
errors.couldNotRetrieveVersion: There was an error retrieving version information.
errors.idInUse: That ID is already in use, please choose a different ID
errors.errorRetrievingRelationships: There was an error retrieving relationships.

access.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this {entity}?
access.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the selected
access.onePermissionRequired: At least one permission is required
access.managePermissions: Manage permissions for each attribute or
access.applyFilter: Administer only a subset of {resource} by applying a filter.
access.mustHaveOneAttributeWithRead: Must have at least one attribute with Read permissions
access.addPrivilegesDescription: Add identities for which this role should grant administration privileges.
access.condtionDescription: Optionally, assign user to role based on the presence of specific attributes.
access.temporalConstraintDescription: Optionally, allow this role to assigned only a temporary basis.

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.attributesDescription: Optionally, define attributes to be mapped to the target system on sync.
assignment.eventSelectDescription: Event on which to execute script.
assignment.eventScriptsDescription: Add scripts to apply additional logic or operations that should be performed when a user receives or loses an entire assignment.
assignment.assignmentSyncDescription: This assignment is applied when {source} are synced to {target}

authenticationDevices.title: 2-Step/Push Authentication
authenticationDevices.subtitle: View devices used for 2-step verification or push authentication for your account.
authenticationDevices.deleteModalText: You will not be able to authenticate using this device and may result in you getting locked out of your account if you rely solely on this device.
authenticationDevices.unableToEditModalText: Unable to edit this device name. Please sign in with this device in order to edit it.
authenticationDevices.unableToDeleteModalText: Unable to delete this device. Please sign in with this device in order to delete it.

forbidden.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to view this site. Please sign out and try again

accountSecurity.title: Sign-in & Security
accountSecurity.subtitle: Update your username or password used to sign in.

profileImageModal.title: Update Profile Picture
profileImageModal.formHelp: Enter a URL where your profile picture is hosted (eg. http://mysite.com/img/profile.jpg).
profileImageModal.imageHelp: The image should be either png or jpg format and should have an aspect ratio of 1:1 (meaning the width and height should be equal), otherwise image aspect distortion will occur.
profileImageModal.aspectHelp: The image will be scaled up or down to fit within the avatar's bounding box.

trustedDevices.title: Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.subtitle: Devices that have accessed your account.
trustedDevices.removeModalText: This will remove access to your account from the device.

accountControls.title: Account Controls
accountControls.subtitle: Download or delete your account data.
accountControls.deleteSubtitle: Permanently delete all your account data.
accountControls.deleteModalBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account data?
accountControls.downloadSubtitle: Download your account profile data, including personal information, account activity, device data, privacy and consent agreements.

social.title: Social Sign In
social.subtitle: Sign-in to your account using social identity providers.
social.deleteModalBody: Are you sure you want to disconnect {providerName} as a social identity provider?
social.disconnectError: Error disconnecting {providerName} as a social identity provider.

oauthApplications.title: Authorized Applications
oauthApplications.subtitle: Applications you have given access to your personal information.
oauthApplications.removeConfirmation: {applicationName} will no longer have access to your account data.

consent.confirmDeny: {mappingName} will no longer have access to your data.
consent.subtitle: Control how your data is shared with third parties.
consent.title: Personal Data Sharing

notFound.couldNotFind: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

scriptEditor.title: Script
scriptEditor.defineCustom: Define custom variables to pass to your script.

timezone.description: Time zone offset based on how many hours a location is from GMT.

deletePanel.body: Are you sure you want to delete {itemName}?

schemaResetSecret.title: Reset {field}
schemaResetSecret.secretResetWarning: The new {field} will be available immediately and the old {field} will no longer work.

clearSessionsModal.modalText: Are you sure you want to end sessions for {name}?
clearSessionsModal.consequencesText: This action will end all application sessions and log the user out.
